title: Ecommerce Farm Project
description: The system is built on a modern Client-Server model. The frontend is developed using Next.js for optimized speed and responsiveness, while the backend uses NestJS to manage APIs and data logic. PostgreSQL is used for data storage. The AI model is based on PhoBeat (fine-tuned from PhoBERT), trained on a curated dataset of over 350 crop diseases. The model predicts disease names and treatment plans from textual descriptions.
